summary.item: Team has been focussing on our teamwork goal, working on the known/unknown feature.
SoC v3.0.13 has been released, containing several performance improvements and a survey that's shown on uninstall.
MT has taken over most of the Project Management responsibilities from CS.
Team's capacity remains reduced in August with MT not doing development and the new developer yet to start.
CVT is getting up to speed and doing some dev work as well as test.
